short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Converts Cyrillic title in Latin URL.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Blogger Translit Title is a Chrome extension that converts Cyrillic title in Latin URL. This extension is intended for Russian-speaking users of the Blogger service. Take a look at the demo video to get an idea of how the Latin URL is built. You just enter the Russian title and extension automatically adds transliterated permalink.
